markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Star of Cynosure](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2423)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 175 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a Will save against a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61) spell, but you haven't rolled yet

**Requirement** You have master proficiency in Will saves.
</row>

</column>

---

Found throughout Golarion, these star-shaped talismans of whalebone scrimshaw are carved by Erutaki from the Crown of the World. They are popular with adherents to the cult of [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5), who believe the talismans protect their dreams.

 When you activate this talisman, you gain a +2 status bonus to saves against enchantment magic with the mental trait for 1 minute. On the triggering save, if the outcome of the roll is a failure, you get a success instead, or if the outcome is a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Star of Cynosure
requirement: You have master proficiency in Will saves.
requirement_markdown: You have master proficiency in Will saves.
